trans-unit.source: Hosts a collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contiene un insieme di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref> oggetti.

trans-unit.source: The DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn class is a specialized type of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn> class used to logically host cells that indicate binary state.
trans-unit.target: La classe DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn è un tipo specializzato del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>classe utilizzata per contenere logicamente celle che indicano uno stato binario.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: A DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn has an associated <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> in every <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> that intersects it.
trans-unit.target: Un DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn ha un associato <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>in ogni <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>che interseca tale</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>

trans-unit.source: Each cell supplies a user interface (UI) that is similar to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox> control.
trans-unit.target: Ogni cella fornisce un'interfaccia utente (UI) che è simile a un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckBox>

trans-unit.source: The default sort mode for this column type is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.
trans-unit.target: La modalità di ordinamento predefinito per questo tipo di colonna è <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode>

trans-unit.source: Typically, check box cell values are intended either for storage, like any other data, or for performing bulk operations.
trans-unit.target: In genere, i valori di cella di casella di controllo vengono utilizzati per l'archiviazione, come gli altri dati, o per l'esecuzione di operazioni bulk.

trans-unit.source: If you want to respond immediately when users click a check box cell, you can handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName> event, but this event occurs before the cell value is updated.
trans-unit.target: Se si desidera rispondere immediatamente quando gli utenti di fare clic su una cella di casella di controllo, è possibile gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>evento, ma questo evento si verifica prima che il valore della cella viene aggiornato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you need the new value at the time of the click, one option is to calculate what the expected value will be based on the current value.
trans-unit.target: Se è necessario il nuovo valore al momento della selezione, è possibile calcolare il valore previsto in base al valore corrente.

trans-unit.source: Another approach is to commit the change immediately, and handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event to respond to it.
trans-unit.target: Un altro approccio consiste nell'eseguire immediatamente il commit della modifica e gestire l' <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>evento per rispondere a tale</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To commit the change when the cell is clicked, you must handle the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: Per eseguire il commit della modifica quando la cella è selezionata, è necessario gestire il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CurrentCellDirtyStateChanged?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the handler, if the current cell is a check box cell, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method and pass in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> value.
trans-unit.target: Nel gestore, se la cella corrente contiene una casella di controllo, chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(metodo) e passare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CommitEdit%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref> class to the default state.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"> </xref> classe allo stato predefinito.

trans-unit.source: Using this default constructor is equivalent to supplying an argument of `false` to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzo del costruttore predefinito è equivalente a fornire un argomento di `false` per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>costruttore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"></xref> and configures it to display check boxes with two or three states.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn"> </xref> e lo configura per visualizzare le caselle di controllo con due o tre stati.

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the column by setting the following properties.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore inizializza la colonna impostando le proprietà seguenti.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>|A new <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> with its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property initialized to the `threeState` parameter value.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>|The value of the `threeState` parameter.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property.|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|
trans-unit.target: | Proprietà | Valore | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>| Un nuovo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>con la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>inizializzata per la `threeState` valore del parametro. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>| Il valore di `threeState` parametro. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName>| | La proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>dell'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>restituita dalla proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | La proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>dell'oggetto <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>restituita dalla proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>. | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if `threeState` is `true`; otherwise, `false`.|</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnSortMode?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.SortMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell></xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to display check boxes with three states; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to display check boxes with two states.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Per visualizzare le caselle di controllo con tre stati; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per visualizzare le caselle di controllo con due stati.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template used to create new cells.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il modello utilizzato per creare nuove celle.

trans-unit.source: The constructors for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn> class initialize this property to a newly created <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>.
trans-unit.target: I costruttori di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn>classe inizializzare questa proprietà su un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell> appena creato</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Changing the properties of the cell template will not immediately affect the user interface (UI) of the column's existing cells.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > La modifica le proprietà del modello di cella non immediatamente avrà l'interfaccia utente (UI) delle celle della colonna esistente.

trans-unit.source: These changes are only apparent after the column is regenerated (for example, by sorting the column or through a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method).
trans-unit.target: Queste modifiche saranno visibili solo dopo la rigenerazione della colonna (ad esempio, dell'ordinamento della colonna o tramite una chiamata al <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>(metodo)).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.InvalidateColumn%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"></xref> that all other cells in the column are modeled after.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell"> </xref> al quale sono modellate tutte le altre celle nella colonna.

trans-unit.source: The default value is a new <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è una nuova <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref> istanza.

trans-unit.source: The property is set to a value that is not of type <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà è impostata su un valore che non è di tipo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column's default cell style.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta lo stile di cella predefinito della colonna.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle> returned by this property has the following initial property values: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` property|Default value| |--------------------------------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> if the initial <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value is `true`; otherwise, `false`.| These values override the value specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, but may be overridden by other cell style properties.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>restituito da questa proprietà contiene i valori iniziali delle proprietà seguenti: |`DataGridViewCellStyle` proprietà | Il valore predefinito | |--------------------------------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName>Se il valore della proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>iniziale è `true`; in caso contrario, `false`. | Questi valori l'override del valore specificato nella <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>controllo, ma può essere sottoposto a override da altre proprietà di stile di cella.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewContentAlignment?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [stili della cella nel controllo DataGridView Windows Form](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the DefaultCellStyle property has a value of `false`, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto restituito dalla proprietà DefaultCellStyle ha un valore `false`, la modifica di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>valore della proprietà da `true` imposta automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, changing the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>ha un valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, la modifica di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A>valore della proprietà da `false` imposta automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>a `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.ThreeState%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"></xref> to be applied as the default style.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle"> </xref> da applicare come stile predefinito.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, which appears as an unchecked box.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore sottostante corrispondente a un valore di cella <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, che viene visualizzato come casella non selezionata.

trans-unit.source: The FalseValue, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: FalseValue, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A>determinano i valori associati di questi stati che si verificano nell'origine dati sottostante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottenere o impostare questa proprietà ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto cella restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Imposta questa proprietà anche il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>visualizzare la colonna di proprietà di ogni cella nella colonna e l'aggiornamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Per ignorare il valore specificato per le singole celle, impostare i valori delle celle dopo aver impostato il valore della colonna.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta un valore che le celle in questa colonna verranno considerato un <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> valore.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the flat style appearance of the check box cells.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'aspetto dello stile flat delle caselle di controllo.

trans-unit.source: To display the check box cells using visual styles, set this property to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle> and call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method before <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Per visualizzare le celle di casella di controllo utilizzando gli stili, impostare questa proprietà su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>e chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metodo prima <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.Run%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Application.EnableVisualStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottenere o impostare questa proprietà ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto cella restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Imposta questa proprietà anche il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>visualizzare la colonna di proprietà di ogni cella nella colonna e l'aggiornamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.FlatStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Per ignorare il valore specificato per le singole celle, impostare i valori delle celle dopo aver impostato il valore della colonna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref> value indicating the appearance of cells in the column.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref> valore che indica l'aspetto delle celle nella colonna.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.FlatStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to an indeterminate or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> cell value, which appears as a disabled checkbox.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore sottostante corrispondente a un indeterminato o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> celle valore, viene visualizzato come casella di controllo disabilitata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, and IndeterminateValue properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A>, IndeterminateValue proprietà e determinano i valori associati di questi stati che si verificano nell'origine dati sottostante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.TrueValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottenere o impostare questa proprietà ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto cella restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Imposta questa proprietà anche il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>visualizzare la colonna di proprietà di ogni cella nella colonna e l'aggiornamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.IndeterminateValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Per ignorare il valore specificato per le singole celle, impostare i valori delle celle dopo aver impostato il valore della colonna.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cells in this column will treat as an indeterminate value.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta un valore che le celle in questa colonna verranno considerato un valore indeterminato.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the hosted check box cells will allow three check states rather than two.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta un valore che indica se le celle di caselle di controllo può supportare tre stati di selezione anziché due.

trans-unit.source: The indeterminate state can be useful, for example, when you do not want to set a default value in the check box.
trans-unit.target: Lo stato indeterminato può essere utile, ad esempio, quando non si desidera impostare un valore predefinito nella casella di controllo.

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottenere o impostare questa proprietà ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto cella restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Imposta questa proprietà anche il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>visualizzare la colonna di proprietà di ogni cella nella colonna e l'aggiornamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.ThreeState%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Per ignorare il valore specificato per le singole celle, impostare i valori delle celle dopo aver impostato il valore della colonna.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> property of the object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> property has a value of `false`, changing the ThreeState property value to `true` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A>proprietà ha un valore `false`, modifica il valore di proprietà ThreeState `true` imposta automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.DefaultCellStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> has a value of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, changing the ThreeState property value to `false` automatically sets <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> to `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>ha un valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState>, modificare il valore di proprietà ThreeState `false` imposta automaticamente <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>a `false`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.CheckState> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle.NullValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the hosted <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"></xref> objects are able to have a third, indeterminate, state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il controllo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell"> </xref> gli oggetti sono in grado di effettuare un terzo stato indeterminato, in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa che descrive la colonna.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that describes the column.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>che descrive la colonna.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the underlying value corresponding to a cell value of <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, which appears as a checked box.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il valore sottostante corrispondente a un valore di cella <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, che viene visualizzato come casella selezionata.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, TrueValue, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> properties determine the associated values of these states as they occur in the underlying data source.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>, TrueValue, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A>determinano i valori associati di questi stati che si verificano nell'origine dati sottostante.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.IndeterminateValue%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.FalseValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Getting or setting this property gets or sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of the cell object returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ottenere o impostare questa proprietà ottiene o imposta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>proprietà dell'oggetto cella restituito dal <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting this property also sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A> property of every cell in the column and refreshes the column display.
trans-unit.target: Imposta questa proprietà anche il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>visualizzare la colonna di proprietà di ogni cella nella colonna e l'aggiornamento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxCell.TrueValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: To override the specified value for individual cells, set the cell values after you set the column value.
trans-unit.target: Per ignorare il valore specificato per le singole celle, impostare i valori delle celle dopo aver impostato il valore della colonna.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> representing a value that the cell will treat as a <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> value.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta un valore che la cella considererà come una <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> valore.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>proprietà <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCheckBoxColumn.CellTemplate*>
